__e: This man is no better than we are, and yet he gets to roam free and make our lives a living hell?
I don't have the money for a hotel... so I was just going to walk around, and it'd be more fun if you came with me.
Listen, Johnny, you're just a kid. People can't go around doing things just because they're right.
I'm sure you'll understand I can't let you leave here.
I just can't understand why they'd let a man like that run around loose.
It's not like you let me run around like that when I was 16.
